programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Comic Legends Of The '90s - Drew Carey (1/10/92)
programme.desc: Drew Carey talks about cold weather and global warming. Fellow guests are David Steinberg and Regis Philbin.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '60s - Clint Eastwood (5/15/92)
programme.desc: Mr. “make-my-day” Clint Eastwood reminisces about Gunsmoke, Outlaw Josey Wales and Dirty Harry.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Animal Antics With Jim Fowler (7/23/80)
programme.desc: Jim Fowler brings out an alligator and crocodile. Plus, Rodney Dangerfield has Johnny in stitches.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '70s - John Travolta (8/6/81)
programme.desc: Actor/pilot John Travolta on flying lessons, dropping out of high school and getting his first part.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Best Of Carnac (1/10/80)
programme.desc: Johnny jokes about Gerald Ford and political slogans and sits down with Phyllis George.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Animal Antics With Joan Embery (9/13/74)
programme.desc: Animal expert and advocate Joan Embery brings some fascinating creatures into the studio.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Comic Legends Of The '60s - Buddy Hackett (3/30/73)
programme.desc: Learn how to raise rabbits on a fire escape with Buddy Hackett and how to light a fire with Brady Watt.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Comic Legends Of The '60s - Carl Reiner (10/5/89)
programme.desc: Carl chats about wife Estelle, a nose injury, forgetfulness, and When Harry Met Sally, by his son Rob Reiner.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Best Of Richard Pryor (2/9/83)
programme.desc: Richard Pryor describes his transforming time in Zimbabwe, quitting drugs and booze. Plus Bette Davis appears.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '70s - Cloris Leachman (2/1/78)
programme.desc: Cloris Leachman talks to Johnny about growing up in Des Moines and doing live TV.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Animal Antics With Joan Embery (4/25/86)
programme.desc: Frequent guest Joan Rivers discusses her autobiography, and Joan Embery brings a rare Albino Koala Bear.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '60s - Victor Buono (8/16/73)
programme.desc: Victor Buono drops in to talk about his recently released book of poetry, and to cut up with Johnny and Ed.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '70s - Burt Reynolds (11/5/86)
programme.desc: Burt Reynolds reflects on his 1973 Cosmo poster, and his five-year romance with actress Loni Anderson.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Comic Legends Of The '50s - Bob Hope (1/16/81)
programme.desc: Bob Hope talks about the game, his early days, and entertaining presidents and his distinctive schnoz.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '80s - Sean Penn (10/9/86)
programme.desc: Sean Penn has a special message for his wife Madonna and Richard Pryor talks about his new Ferrari.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Animal Antics With Jim Fowler (1/22/88)
programme.desc: Jim Fowler, the host of “Mutual of Omaha’s Wild Kingdom,” brings an Indian Condor onto the show.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '70s - Donald Sutherland (5/13/83)
programme.desc: Autograph hounds watch out: Donald Sutherland has a policy on handling signature seekers.

programme.sub-title: Comic Legends Of The '60s - Buddy Hackett (3/30/73)
programme.desc: Learn how to raise rabbits on a fire escape with Buddy Hackett and how to light a fire with Brady Watt.
